REGISTRATION.EMAIL_NOT_UNIQUE: The supplied email is not unique.
REGISTRATION.CELLPHONE_NOT_UNIQUE: The supplied cellphone is not unique.
REGISTRATION.POST_SIGNUP_ACCESS_RULE: User registered, but post signup access rules failed.
REGISTRATION.USER_EXIST_IN_ECOSYSTEM_NOT_IN_DOMAIN: The user already exists within the ecosystem but not on the specific domain.
REGISTRATION.USER_EXIST_IN_ECOSYSTEM_IN_OTHER_DOMAIN: The user already exists within the ecosystem and has an account on another mutually exclusive domain.
REGISTRATION.USER_NOT_UNIQUE: FirstName + LastName + Dob not unique exception
REGISTRATION.USER_UNDERAGE: User is below the legal age

PASSWORD.CURRENT_MATCH_NEW: New password cannot be the same as current password.
PASSWORD.USER_NOT_FOUND: User not found or invalid user guid.

LOGIN.ACCESS_DENIED: Your username or password is incorrect.
LOGIN.ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION: You need to provide additional information to complete registration.
LOGIN.DOMAIN_UNKNOWN_COUNTRY: You can't login from an unknown country. Please contact customer support.
LOGIN.FLAGGED_AS_COOLING_OFF: Player account is flagged as cooling off.

MY_ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND: Player account could not be found.
